deny_publication_request.subject: Publication request denied
deny_publication_request.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user ($role) has denied the request for publication of the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version with this note: $comment.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

accept_publication_request.subject: Publication request accepted
accept_publication_request.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user ($role) has accepted the request for publication of the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version. The curator will provide you with the DOI for your ATBD and inform you once the ATBD is public.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

new_atbd.subject: You are lead author for an ATBD in APT
new_atbd.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

You are now the lead author of the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

new_atbd_for_curators.subject: A new ATBD has been created in APT
new_atbd_for_curators.content: The ATBD $atbd_title has been created in APT. The lead author is $app_user ($role).

delete_atbd.subject: An existing ATBD has been deleted in APT

added_as_reviewer.subject: Request to review an ATBD in APT
added_as_reviewer.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user ($role) has requested your review on the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version . Please log into your account and open the ATBD to begin your review.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

added_as_author.subject: New author added to an ATBD in APT
added_as_author.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user ($role) has added you as a collaborating author on the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version and you now have access to the document.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

added_as_lead_author.subject: ATBD ownership change in APT
added_as_lead_author.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user ($role) has transferred ownership of the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version. You are now lead author and responsible for ATBD progress.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

ownership_revoked.subject: Your APT ATBD ownership has been revoked
ownership_revoked.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user ($role) has transferred ownership of the following ATBD version to another: $atbd_title, $atbd_version to $transferred_to. You have been added as an author to the document, but are no longer the lead author.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

new_thread_created.subject: A new thread has been created
new_thread_created.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user has added a new comment to an existing thread in the ATBD document: $atbd_title, $atbd_version, section: $section.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

new_comment_created.subject: A new comment has been added to the APT ATBD
new_comment_created.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user has added a new comment to an existing thread in the ATBD document: $atbd_title, $atbd_version, section: $section.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

comment_mention.subject: You have been mentioned in a comment on ATBD $atbd_title in APT
comment_mention.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

You have been mentioned in a comment on ATBD $atbd_title in APT.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

request_closed_review.subject: Review requested
request_closed_review.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user has marked the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version as ready for closed review.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

cancel_closed_review_request.subject: Review request cancelled
cancel_closed_review_request.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user has removed their request for closed review of the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

deny_closed_review_request.subject: Review request denied
deny_closed_review_request.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user ($role) has denied the request for closed review of the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version with this note: $comment.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

accept_closed_review_request.subject: Review request accepted
accept_closed_review_request.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user ($role) has accepted the request for closed review of the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version. You will be notified when the document is re-opened.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

all_reviews_done.subject: All reviews are finished
all_reviews_done.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

All reviewers of the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version have marked their review as DONE. Open the document for all to access.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

open_review.subject: The ATBD review is now open
open_review.content:
Hi $preferred_username,

$app_user ($role) has opened the ATBD review for: $atbd_title, $atbd_version You may now access the document and edit or respond to comments.

Sincerely,

The APT Team

publish.content:

$app_user ($role) has published the following ATBD version: $atbd_title, $atbd_version. The ATBD is now publicly available on APT. Visit APT to obtain the document DOI.

Sincerely,

The APT Team
